document.full_text: rory mcilroy had a birdie putt on his last eight holes and converted half of them on his way to a six-under-par 66 to join chris riley in the lead after the first round.
document.title: mcilroy shows he likes memorial
lines_and_colors: rory mcilroy had a birdie putt on his last eight holes and converted half of them on his way to a six-under-par 66 to join chris riley in the lead after the first round.
